import React, { useState } from 'react' import { getListFromLocal, ItemCart} from '../../model/ItemCart' interface Props{ itemCart:ItemCart, onChangeQuantity:(quantity:number,id:string)=>void } export default function ItemCartRender(props:Props) { const [value,setValue]=useState(props.itemCart.quantity) const onCLickPlus =()=>{ props.onChangeQuantity(+props.itemCart.quantity+1,props.itemCart.id) setValue(value+1) } const onCLickMinus =()=>{ props.onChangeQuantity(+props.itemCart.quantity-1,props.itemCart.id) setValue(value-1) } return (

Name: {props.itemCart.name}

Price:{props.itemCart.price}$

Remove

props.onChangeQuantity(Number(e.target.value),props.itemCart.id)}/> {+props.itemCart.quantity*props.itemCart.price}$ ) }
